tool_description: Handles missing values in time series market data using various interpolation and filling methods.

values.description: Array of values that may contain missing data (represented as null or NaN)

method.description: Filling method: forward_fill, backward_fill, linear_interpolation, mean_fill

error_messages: Array length mismatch: timestamps and values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid method: Use one of [forward_fill, backward_fill, linear_interpolation, mean_fill].
All values missing: Cannot perform interpolation when all values are missing.
Insufficient valid data: Need at least 2 valid data points for interpolation methods.
usage: Provide timestamps and values arrays with missing data, specify filling method. Returns cleaned arrays with missing values handled.

clean_timestamps.description: Timestamps array after handling missing data

clean_values.description: Values array with missing data filled

filled_count.description: Number of missing values that were filled

method_used.description: The filling method that was applied
